languages.text: Приближенную Лорд-капитана, сестру Ардженту, обнаружили в ее каюте, спящую наяву, бледную и в слезах. Сестра не реагировала на окружающих, сжимала в руке обгоревший фрагмент аквилы и раз за разом звала мать. Привести ее в чувство удалось лишь спустя час.

Sister Argenta, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found in her cabin — pale, crying, and caught up in a waking dream. She didn't seem to notice anyone around her. Instead, she clutched a fragment of a burnt Aquila in her hand and kept calling for her mother. It took an hour to bring her round.
languages.original_text: Приближенную Лорд-капитана, сестру Ардженту, обнаружили в ее каюте, спящую наяву, бледную и в слезах. Сестра не реагировала на окружающих, сжимала в руке обгоревший фрагмент аквилы и раз за разом звала мать. Привести ее в чувство удалось лишь спустя час.

traits.locale_text: Sister Argenta, one of Lord-captain's personal team, was found in her cabin — pale, crying, and in a waking dream. She didn't seem to notice anyone around her. Instead, she clutched a fragment of a burnt aquila in her hand and kept calling for her mother. In about an hour or so, Sister Argenta finally became responsive and calmed down.

Instead, she clutched a fragment of a burnt aquila in her hand and kept calling for her mother. In about an hour or so, Sister Argenta finally became responsive and calmed down.

Sister Argenta, one of the Lord Captain's personal team, was found in her cabin — pale, crying, and in a waking dream. She didn't seem to notice anyone around her. Instead, she clutched a fragment of a burnt Aquila in her hand and kept calling for her mother. In about an hour or so, Sister Argenta finally became responsive and calmed down.

Sister Argenta, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found in her cabin — pale, crying, and caught up in a waking dream. She didn't seem to notice anyone around her. Instead, she clutched a fragment of a burnt Aquila in her hand and kept calling for her mother. It took an hour to bring her round.

Sister Argenta, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found in her cabin — pale, crying, and caught up in a waking dream. She didn't seem to notice anyone around her. Instead, she clutched a fragment of a burnt Aquila in her hand and kept calling for her mother. It took an hour to bring her round.

languages.text: 领主舰长的私人随行人员阿洁塔修女，是在她本人的房间内被发现的。发现她的时候，她脸色惨白，痛哭失声，仿佛是在清醒状态下陷入了梦境。她似乎并没有注意到周围任何人，而是紧紧地握着烧焦的双头鹰碎片，不停地呼唤着她的母亲。她花了一个小时才缓过来。
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found in her cabin — pale, crying, and caught up in a waking dream. She didn't seem to notice anyone around her. Instead, she clutched a fragment of a burnt Aquila in her hand and kept calling for her mother. It took an hour to bring her round.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长的私人随行人员阿洁塔修女，是在她本人的房间内被发现的。发现她的时候，她脸色惨白，痛哭失声，仿佛是在清醒状态下陷入了梦境。她似乎并没有注意到周围任何人，而是紧紧地握着烧焦的双头鹰碎片，不停地呼唤着她的母亲。她花了一个小时才缓过来。

languages.text: La hermana Argenta, miembro del séquito personal de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, apareció en su camarote, pálida, llorosa y atrapada en un sueño. No parecía ver a nadie a su alrededor. En vez de eso, se aferraba a un fragmento de un Aquila quemada y llamaba constantemente a su madre. Tardó una hora en recuperar la compostura.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found in her cabin — pale, crying, and caught up in a waking dream. She didn't seem to notice anyone around her. Instead, she clutched a fragment of a burnt Aquila in her hand and kept calling for her mother. It took an hour to bring her round.

traits.locale_text: La hermana Argenta, miembro del séquito personal de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, apareció en su camarote, pálida, llorosa y atrapada en un sueño. No parecía ver a nadie a su alrededor. En vez de eso, se aferraba a un fragmento de un Aquila quemada y llamaba constantemente a su madre. Tardó una hora en recuperar la compostura.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの随員の一人であるシスター・アルジェンタが、船室で発見された。青ざめ、涙を流し、白日夢にとらわれている。彼女は周りにいる誰にも気づいていないようだ。それどころか焦げたアクィラの破片を手に握りしめ、母親を呼び続けている。彼女を呼び覚ますのに、1時間は要した。
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found in her cabin — pale, crying, and caught up in a waking dream. She didn't seem to notice anyone around her. Instead, she clutched a fragment of a burnt Aquila in her hand and kept calling for her mother. It took an hour to bring her round.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの随員の一人であるシスター・アルジェンタが、船室で発見された。青ざめ、涙を流し、白日夢にとらわれている。彼女は周りにいる誰にも気づいていないようだ。それどころか焦げたアクィラの破片を手に握りしめ、母親を呼び続けている。彼女を呼び覚ますのに、1時間は要した。

languages.text: Schwester Argenta aus dem persönlichen Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wurde in ihrer Kabine gefunden — blass, weinend und in einem Wachtraum gefangen. Sie schien niemanden um sich herum zu bemerken. Stattdessen hielt sie ein Fragment eines verbrannten Aquila umklammert und rief immer wieder nach ihrer Mutter. Es dauerte eine ganze Stunde, sie aus diesem Zustand zu holen.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found in her cabin — pale, crying, and caught up in a waking dream. She didn't seem to notice anyone around her. Instead, she clutched a fragment of a burnt Aquila in her hand and kept calling for her mother. It took an hour to bring her round.

traits.locale_text: Schwester Argenta aus dem persönlichen Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wurde in ihrer Kabine gefunden — blass, weinend und in einem Wachtraum gefangen. Sie schien niemanden um sich herum zu bemerken. Stattdessen hielt sie ein Fragment eines verbrannten Aquila umklammert und rief immer wieder nach ihrer Mutter. Es dauerte eine ganze Stunde, sie aus diesem Zustand zu holen.

languages.text: Sœur Argenta, membre de l'escorte personnelle {mf|du|de la} seigneur-capitaine, a été trouvée dans sa cabine, pâle, en pleurs et en pleine crise de somnambulisme. Elle n'a pas semblé remarquer les gens qui l'entouraient. De plus, elle serrait un fragment d'Aquila brisé dans sa main et appelait sa mère encore et encore. Il a fallu une heure pour la faire revenir à la raison.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found in her cabin — pale, crying, and caught up in a waking dream. She didn't seem to notice anyone around her. Instead, she clutched a fragment of a burnt Aquila in her hand and kept calling for her mother. It took an hour to bring her round.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın maiyetinden Rahibe Argenta, kabininde solgun, ağlar vaziyette ve uyanık bir rüyanın etkisinde bulundu. Çevresindekileri fark etmiyor gibi görünüyordu. Elinde yanmış bir Çift Başlı Kartal parçası tutarak annesine seslenip duruyordu. Onu kendine getirmek bir saat sürdü.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta, one of the Lord Captain's personal retinue, was found in her cabin — pale, crying, and caught up in a waking dream. She didn't seem to notice anyone around her. Instead, she clutched a fragment of a burnt Aquila in her hand and kept calling for her mother. It took an hour to bring her round.
